content.en: Plagiarism detection: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to detect plagiarism in student assignments and source code datasets. These algorithms, such as the YAP3 system and the PDetect software, use clustering, phylogenetic trees, and structure-based techniques to identify instances of plagiarism. They also aim to reduce false positives, improve detection accuracy, and address structural modifications in plagiarized code. These advancements in algorithmic detection systems are crucial for maintaining academic integrity and ensuring fair evaluation in programming education.
content.da: Plagiatdetektion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at opdage plagiat i studenteropgaver og kildekodedatasæt. Disse algoritmer, såsom YAP3-systemet og PDetect-software, bruger klyngedannelse, fylogenetiske træer og strukturbaserede teknikker til at identificere tilfælde af plagiat. De sigter også mod at reducere falske positiver, forbedre detekteringsnøjagtigheden og håndtere strukturelle ændringer i plagieret kode. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmiske detektionssystemer er afgørende for at opretholde akademisk integritet og sikre retfærdig evaluering i programmeringsuddannelse.
